Articles.Content:
Okay I had a question as I have seen this done on a few Manned missions before but I know you can have at least 1 of the kerbals do an EVA, but I was wondering what it would take to do 2 or 3 (or in the case of the Dragon Rider Capsule) how to make all 7 leave the ship once it touches down..

Any ideas as to how?

Space_Coyote
EVA a kerbal, switch back to the ship by cycling through nearby objects with the [ and ] keys, When your focus is back on the original ship, EVA another kerbal.

EVA a kerbal, switch back to the ship by cycling through nearby objects with the [ and ] keys, When your focus is back on the original ship, EVA another kerbal.

That did the trick!

Never did it before but now that this little tric is revealed.. time to go on a major Mun EVA...

Positive reputation for you sir!

Space_coyote
